name: Persona 5 Scramble: The Phantom Strikers - Otakara BOX
summary: This edition includes the following: Persona 5 Scramble: The Phantom Strikers, New Illustrated Special Box, Persona 5 Scramble: The Phantom Strikers art book (48 pages), Persona 5 Scramble: The Phantom Strikers original soundtrack (45 tracks), Persona 5 Scramble: The Phantom Strikers Making-Of Blu-ray Theme Song “You Are Stronger”, Morgana towel (350mm x 900mm), Persona Team original design sacoche
